testcase.name: Initiate the Client_Credentials API with valid fields and verify the Expected Result
testcase.system-out: * call read('classpath:reusable.feature') ................................. passed * def testData = read('classpath:com/assignment3/karateFW/testdata/testData.json') . passed Given url testData.baseURI + testData.CardAuthResource .................... passed And header Authorization = testData.base64 ................................ passed And header Content-Type = testData.Content_Type ........................... passed And header Accept = testData.accept ....................................... passed And header uuid = randomString(20) ........................................ passed And form field grant_type = testData.Grant_Type ........................... passed And form field scope = testData.Scope ..................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * print response .......................................................... passed * match response.token_type == '#string' .................................. passed * match response.access_token == '#present' ............................... passed * def tokenType = response.token_type ..................................... passed * def accessToken = response.access_token ................................. passed * def accessToken = tokenType+' '+accessToken ............................. passed * print accessToken ....................................................... passed * print '********* Access Token Generated *********' ...................... passed
